acquire-3g-ticket.additional-information: You can scan a QR code or upload an existing PDF or image to use it to log in directly at a location for a certain period of time. This is needed to be allowed to enter a location. Alternatively, you can manually confirm that you are carrying 3-G-evidence and be able to prove it in case of a manual control.
acquire-3g-ticket.create-ticket-success-body: The acquired entrance ticket for {{place}} was successfully created.
acquire-3g-ticket.manage-tickets-text: Active tickets could be found. You can manage your active tickets at:
acquire-3g-ticket.confirm-checkbox-valid-cert-text: I confirm the accuracy of my evidence and understand that any misuse of the greenlight app or the provision of incorrect data can lead to legal consequences.
acquire-3g-ticket.found-valid-selftest-preCheck: A locally saved self-test was found.
acquire-3g-ticket.invalid-body: Please try again with another document.
acquire-3g-ticket.invalid-qr-body: The QR code does not contain a valid 3-G-evidence.
acquire-3g-ticket.not-same-person: The person in the uploaded evidence does not match the person logged in.
acquire-3g-ticket.self-test-information: Please check whether the evidence is still valid.
acquire-3g-ticket.trust-and-save-1: I agree to import my 3-G-evidence and store this data on my device.
acquire-3g-ticket.trust-and-save-2: Your data is stored and processed exclusively on this device. There is no automatic transfer of imported 3-G-evidence between devices. 3-G-evidence imported on other devices is only available on these devices.
acquire-3g-ticket.confirm-not-checked-body: Please confirm that the information you have provided is correct and that you are aware that misuse of the greenlight app may lead to legal consequences

show-active-tickets.no-tickets-message: You do not have any tickets!
show-active-tickets.delete-ticket-success-body: The ticket for {{place}} was successfully deleted.
show-active-tickets.self-test-information: Please check whether the evidence is still valid.
show-active-tickets.no-evidence: No valid stored 3-G-evidence was found. Show your evidence manually or upload new evidence by creating a new ticket.
show-active-tickets.invalid-evidence: If the 3-G-evidence is no longer valid, you can create a new ticket and upload a new evidence.
show-active-tickets.delete-ticket-notfound-body: No active ticket: {{place}} was found. The ticket has probably already expired or deleted.
show-active-tickets.logged-out-body: The session has expired. Please log in again.
show-active-tickets.3-g-evidence-green-pass-valid: Green passport imported and valid on this device
show-active-tickets.3-g-evidence-selftest: Self-test imported on this device, manual control necessary
show-active-tickets.3-g-evidence-internal-test: University internal test imported on this device and valid
show-active-tickets.3-g-evidence-invalid: No valid 3-G evidence found on this device
show-active-tickets.3-g-evidence-invalid-text: You may have imported your evidence on another device, the evidence is no longer valid or the application has not been used for a longer period of time.
show-active-tickets.3-g-evidence-maximize-saving: Add the app to the home screen to maximize the storage time of the 3-G evidence. How to do this you can read
show-active-tickets.internal-test-text: The university-internal test was validated during the import. A manual check is only possible with the original document.
show-active-tickets.reload-error-body: The update failed. Check your internet connection, log in again or try again later.

show-reference-ticket.description: At this point the validity of an entrance ticket is displayed. Whether a ticket is active or inactive depends on the 3-G evidence imported on the controlled person's device. The reference ticket does not entitle you to enter the university.
show-reference-ticket.information-container-body: If a valid health certitificate is available on this device then its QR-code is displayed and the ticked is shown in color. This QR-code can be checked with Green Check. If a self-test was issued by Land Steiermark or Land Kärnten is available on this device then its QR-code is displayed and the ticket is shown in black and white. This QR-code cannot be validated by this app, therefore its validation requires a QR-code scanner. If a valid test made by Teststraße of TU Graz is available on this device then the ticket is shown in color. Manual validation of this test can only be done with the original document.

validity-tooltip: According to the current regulations of {{place}}. The validity period is automatically updated when the regulations change.
error-login-message: You need to be logged in to use this function!

hcert.cert-not-valid-error: Does not comply with the following rules: {{error}}
